<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> <[[http://duncanaviation.aero/]]> *Photo taken by Honeywell channel partner, JetCity Engineering. The DU-875 and HAPP Upgrade for Learjet 40/45 by Honeywell and Duncan Aviation
Protect more than $850,000 of avionics in your Learjet 40 or 45 with Honeywell’s Avionics Protection Plan. For a limited time, you can save 15% on your new HAPP contract when you sign up before June 30. As an added bonus, you can take advantage of the DU-870 to DU-875 LCD display replacement program, which allows you to exchange a failed DU-870 for a DU-875.
If your old CRTs are still functioning, but you'd like to ditch your old displays for new DU-875's, Honeywell is currently offering a trade-in credit for Learjet 40 and 45 operators. For a limited time, you can save up to $160,000* when you trade-in all four displays.
Contact Duncan Aviation today to take advantage of these special offers.
Act now, this offer expires June 30.
CONTACT US <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/the-du-875-and-happ-upgrade-for-learjet-40-45-by-honeywell-and-duncan-aviation]]>
*Operators can save up to $160,000 when they trade-in all four (4) of their DU-870 display units. Offer expires June 30, 2017.
